item.title: Video Production in Chicago - Upwork
item.description:
Videographer Needed for Bold Generative AI Videocast in Chicago

Job Overview:
We're looking for a dynamic videographer to shoot, edit, and produce a 20-30 minute videocast featuring two thought leaders discussing Generative AI in the Enterprise. This project will be fast-paced, edgy, and creatively demanding.

What You'll Do:

Conduct a 1-2 hour video shoot in Chicago (Address TBD).
Record a videocast with a bit of movement—think podcast meets TED Talk with some arm-waving and room-walking.
Will take one or two cameras; mostly stationary (won't need two cameras moving).
Edit the footage into a bold, punchy 20-30 minute videocast.
Include supers, study data cut-ins (images provided), branded intro and outro (logos, etc., provided), and engaging video effects and sounds.
Work improvisationally and fast, adapting and contributing creative ideas.
Complete the shoot, including setup and load out, within 3 hours. Editing should be around 8 hours.


Requirements:

Proven experience in video shooting and editing.
We aren't looking for someone with 75 years of experience....
We want to work with people who come in ready to try new things.
Ability to produce high-energy, visually appealing content.
Quick adaptability and strong creative input.
Comfortable with fast-paced, improvisational work.
If you have any specific questions, please contact Siddhi at siddhi.pradhan@ascendion.com.


Our Style:

We are from Ascendion (a global AI-first software engineering services company).
We work fast and expect quick turnarounds.
We WANT to try  new things and improvise on the spot.
Two rounds of feedback max, with the final video ready within 7-8 days post-shoot.
If you're up for a provocative, edgy, and fun project, we want to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 21:07 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Nonfiction, Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Social Media Video, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Nonfiction, Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Social Media Video, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Paris Playdates - Videographer/Editor/Photographer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello

We are visiting Paris and will need:

4-5 short videos produced (with still photos included)
2-3 photoshoots (branding and lifestyle)

Two different projects, but similar needs and styles.

I am a youtuber and vlogger who loves fashion, traveling and spirituality. My content is upbeat, informative, and artistic. I also write music and have music videos out - but main focus is:

+Video of me visiting Monet's Garden in Giverny (adventure day!)
+Informative video of burlesque and the Moulin Rouge.

+BTS Video of art and creating time at our home.

+Artist branding photoshoot
+Fashion/Friendship photoshoot

My desire is to have the photos within a 5-7 days and the videos within 10-14 days.

I am open to hiring one person for all of these if the creative chemistry and price is right!! I like quality content - doesn't have to be longest videos 2-10 minutes.

Photoshoots are always fun and easy.

We are staying somewhere near the Louvre. Some videos will take place onsite of the home, others will require travel (which I'll pay your train expenses, etc)

Please share your portfolio and website. I'll share my whatsapp once I've received aligned invitations.

All the Best!!
Eager to co-create and enjoy Paris.

Thank you for your time.

Hannah Marie

Hourly Range: $20.00-$84.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:59 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Fashion & Beauty, People, Travel & Hospitality, Videography, Photography, Video Editing
Skills: Fashion & Beauty, People, Travel & Hospitality, Videography, Photography, Video Editing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor (LOS) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:
Niche: BASKETBALL
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 8-15 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.
We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the BASKETBALL niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): CRAZY BAKSETBALL STORIES/FACTS
Would be great if you can make a 1 minute sample!
The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks
Here is an example of the type of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/yKTND_ikxlc?si=FSXJnzK5dVDKgorp
Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)
Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].
Start your bid with [Insert Random Word; Example: "Banana Milkshake"], so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.
Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator - 500 - Upwork
item.description:
At least 20 shorts per week
$100 flat rate pay per week
+ Commission-based affiliate model ($5-$10 per sale generated). The average affiliate expected sales volume should be 200-500 units per month. ($2k-$5k in commissions)

Looking for video editors who are experienced with making shorts. Mainly on tiktok. We are an e-commerce brand looking for editors and UGC creators to help us pump out TikTok shorts and using AI-generated content and re-purposing already existing content in a specific niche. This will involve using scripts, and generating AI images combined with real-life videos.

Here are some examples of videos:
- www.tiktok.com/@pure.shilajit/video/7263840079964097825?lang=en
- www.tiktok.com/@thisispureshilajit/video/7335479874267712800?lang=en
- www.tiktok.com/@thisispureshilajit/video/7279501650832723232?lang=en

To apply answer the following:
1. Do you have experience making engaging video scripts or creatives?
2. Do you have experience working with AI to generate visuals?
3. Send your video editing portfolio.
4. Do you have any other skills besides video editing?
5. Do you have any access to AI tools? Free or paid? Which ones?
6. Submit your application with the phrase “RG” as the title or header.
7. Do you have experience making UGC vids or real life vids for tiktok?

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Video Animation, AI-Generated Video, TikTok Video, Content Creation, Video Editing, TikTok Marketing, YouTube Shorts
Skills: UGC, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Video Animation, AI-Generated Video, TikTok Video, Content Creation, Video Editing, TikTok Marketing, YouTube Shorts
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics Designer/ Business Short Film - Upwork
item.description:
KBM Resorts is a vacation rental company looking to have someone create a short video for our website. Our properties are primarily in Hawaii and Park City, Utah but we are in the midst of expanding. We have provided a short script to use and would like animation that is relevant to the message we are trying to convey.

Example videos:
-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=juoBoc5yOZ4
-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zsoye9WzWgk
-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gI54_E-6Ps0
-https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/jjtesz65j3moqv7p4jh0j/AOXxhyH9zqnh7MiJkVK72xY?e=2&preview=Castle+Generic+Shorten+Final-+preview+file.mov&rlkey=vlhd3rpi09jqbdize6582kru2&st=jnls3ble&dl=0

Script Below:

"Welcome to KBM Resorts, where luxury meets exceptional property management. We are excited to share why choosing KBM as your premier rental manager is not just a smart business move, but an opportunity to elevate your investment to new heights."


"At KBM Resorts, we understand that your property is more than just brick and mortar—it's a reflection of your dreams and hard-earned money. By partnering with us, you're not just entrusting us with your investment property; you're investing in unparalleled service, attention to detail, and financial success."


"Our rental program offers a host of benefits designed to maximize your returns while providing peace of mind. From our dedicated marketing team driving bookings to our experienced staff ensuring that every guest experience is top-notch, and in-house maintenance program, we leave no stone unturned in maximizing your property's potential."

(Animation of workers, warehouse, housekeeping, maintenance, marketing)

"But don't just take my word for it. Hear from our valued owners who have experienced the benefits firsthand. Joining our rental program means joining a community of like-minded individuals who share a passion for excellence and a commitment to success."

[Owner Testimonials]
[Cut to testimonials from satisfied owners who have seen success with KBM Resorts' rental program.]

[Why KBM]

"So, why should you choose KBM Resorts? Because we don't just offer a place to stay; we offer an experience that's truly extraordinary and assures owner satisfaction. Let us turn your investment into an unforgettable journey of success. Contact us today and let's embark on this exciting partnership together. Thank you for considering KBM Resorts—where luxury meets exceptional property management.”


Hourly Range: $15.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 20:45 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 2D Animation, Adobe Illustrator, Animation, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 2D Animation, Adobe Illustrator, Animation, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer needed to record a proposal at the Grand Canyon - Upwork
item.description:
We are searching for a talented videographer to film a once-in-a-lifetime event - a proposal at the Grand Canyon. The perfect candidate will have experience in filming outdoor occasions specifically for social media. This job requires great attention to detail and the ability to work discreetly, as it is essential to maintain the surprise element. If you have the skills and creativity to deliver an amazing proposal video, we would be thrilled to hear from you!

Relevant skills:
- Videography
- Filming outdoor events
- Cinematography
- Attention to detail
